title: Voltage
description: Based on the comic book series, Voltage tells the story of Tess, a high school student who is struck by lightning. After that night, everything changes and her new secret could destroy the world or save it.
altHero: Tess, a blonde teenager, shooting blue lightning from her hands
alt1: Tess kneeling with her hands palm up and blue eletrical currents flowing between them
alt2: villain with half face of metal and a glowing purple eye
alt3: Tess looking at a floating purple electrical orb
alt4: teen boy holding Tess, unconscious, and he’s surrounded by blue electricity and his eyes are glowing blue
